casebody.data:
In the Matter of A.P.R., A.C.R., minor children.
appealed by Petitioner, Sharon, R. No. 515P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Richard Croutharmel, for Sharon R. Jamie Hamlett, for Alamance Co. DSS. Robert Collins, Graham, for Alamance Co. GAL. Donald R., for Father.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 13th day of September 2005 by Respondent in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of November 2005."
